thread.title: Brady Announces 2015 Platinum Partner of the Year Winner
thread.title_full: Brady Announces 2015 Platinum Partner of the Year Winner

author: Casey Schaak
title: Brady Announces 2015 Platinum Partner of the Year Winner
text:
Brady (NYSE:BRC), a global leader in industrial and safety printing systems and solutions, recently announced the recipient of its first Platinum Partner of the Year award: Horizon Solutions. Brady recently developed its Platinum Partner program to support the distributors who have made a commitment to exclusively market Brady products. “The Platinum Partner program was created to support our distributors and assist them in growing sales,” says Stewart Landy, channel manager for Brady. “This is the first year of the program, and the first year we’ve had the opportunity to award one of our distributor partners. A big congratulations to Horizon Solutions for earning the award – it was well deserved and a true reflection of their strong performance and partnership.”
Platinum Partner of the Year finalists were evaluated by Brady’s sales leadership teams. The criteria under review were: sales performance, sales force engagement, executive engagement, and sales and marketing activities.
“To be selected as the inaugural Platinum Partner of the Year recipient is a tremendous honor for Horizon Solutions,” says Scott Wilson, director of Industrial and Safety Products and Services for Horizon Solutions. “Our relationship has grown over many years of hard work. There are three key areas that have helped make this possible: Brady’s foresight and innovation, commitment to its affiliated distributors and, most importantly, the quality of the field sales people that cover our territory.”
The Platinum Partner program offers distributors a variety of sales and marketing programs, and will continue to expand around the needs of Brady’s platinum distributor partners.

About Brady Corporation:
Brady Corporation is an international manufacturer and marketer of complete solutions that identify and protect people, products and places. Brady’s products help customers increase safety, security, productivity and performance and include high-performance labels, signs, safety devices, printing systems and software. Founded in 1914, the Company has a diverse customer base in electronics, telecommunications, manufacturing, electrical, construction, medical, aerospace and a variety of other industries. Brady is headquartered in Milwaukee, Wisconsin and as of August 1, 2015, employed approximately 6,400 people in its worldwide businesses. Brady’s fiscal 2015 sales were approximately $1.17 billion. Brady stock trades on the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol BRC. More information is available on the Internet at http://www.bradycorp.com .
